Id.description: The unique identifier for the package.

Title.description: A human-readable title for the package.

Description.Description: A brief description of what this package does.

TargetFolder.description: The name of the folder that this package is installed to. If this is not specified, the Id of the package will be used.

InstallScripts.description: A list of paths to scripts to run after the package was installed. The paths are relative to the package root and must point to a path within the package root.

UninstallScripts.description: A list of paths to scripts to run before the package is uninstalled. The paths are relative to the package root and must point to a path within the package root.

Links.description: A list of start menu links to create.

LinkTarget.description: The target that the shortcut points to.

Icon.description: An URL to the icon displayed for the shortcut.

LinkGroup.description: The name of the group (subfolder) where to place this shortcut.

WorkingDirectory.description: An optional working directory for the LinkTarget.

Associations.description: A list of file associations to create.

FileTypeDescription.description: The description of the file association.

ExecuteCommand.description: The command to be executed for this association.

Service.description: If this package installs a service, this describes the service that will be created.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the service.

Executable.description: The (package-root-relative) path to the service executable.

Arguments.description: The arguments to pass to the service executable.

StartService.description: Specifies if the service should be started after installation.
